languages.text: Весь переход я провел в отсеке астропатического хора, покрытом коркой психического льда. Я видел, как аколиты корабельного хирурга бросились на бьющихся в беззвучной истерике псайкеров, пытаясь ввести им успокоительные медикаменты. Тела получивших суровое лекарство сводила судорога паралича, порой останавливавшая не только буйство разума, но и биение сердца. Истерия, охватившая астропатов, была безжалостно остановлена и не прорвалась на другие палубы.

traits.locale_text: Весь переход я провел в отсеке астропаточесокго хора, покрытом коркой психического льда. Я видел, как аколиты Корабельного хирурга бросилась на бьющихся в беззвучной истерике псайкеров, пытаясь ввести им успокоительные медикаменты. Тела получивших суровое лекарство сводила судорога паралича, порой останавливавшая не только буйство разума, но и биение сердца. Истерия, охватившая астропатов, была безжалостно остановлена и не прорвалась на другие палубы.

languages.text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.
languages.original_text: Весь переход я провел в отсеке астропатического хора, покрытом коркой психического льда. Я видел, как аколиты корабельного хирурга бросились на бьющихся в беззвучной истерике псайкеров, пытаясь ввести им успокоительные медикаменты. Тела получивших суровое лекарство сводила судорога паралича, порой останавливавшая не только буйство разума, но и биение сердца. Истерия, охватившая астропатов, была безжалостно остановлена и не прорвалась на другие палубы.

traits.locale_text: I spent the entire passage in the astropathic choir section, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving pyskers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralyzed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralyzed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving pyskers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralyzed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. I spent the entire passage in the Astropathic Choir section, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

languages.text: Me pasé el salto entero en las profundidades del Coro de Astrópatas, que estaba cubierto de hielo psíquico. Observé cómo los acólitos del cirujano cargaban contra los psíquicos que deliraban en silencio e intentaban sedarlos. Los cuerpos de quienes recibieron esta medicación quedaron paralizados y sus mentes se detuvieron, al igual que ocasionalmente sus corazones. La histeria que se había apoderado de los Astrópatas fue contenida sin piedad y no llegó a alcanzar las otras cubiertas.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

traits.locale_text: Me pasé la travesía entera en las profundidades del coro de astrópatas, que estaba cubierto de hielo psíquico. Observé cómo los acólitos del cirujano cargaban contra los psíquicos que deliraban en silencio e intentaban sedarlos. Los cuerpos de quienes recibieron esta medicación quedaron paralizados y sus mentes se detuvieron, al igual que ocasionalmente sus corazones. La histeria que se había apoderado de los astrópatas fue contenida sin piedad y no llegó a alcanzar las otras cubiertas.

languages.text: 整场旅行期间，我都躲在星语唱诗班中，那里被灵能的冰层覆盖。我看到船医的侍仆们冲向那些发出无声尖啸的灵能者，试图给他们注射镇定剂。那些被注射了烈性镇定剂的人身体瘫痪下来，狂乱的思维也被迫中止，有些人甚至连心脏都停止了跳动。影响那些星语者的癔症被无情地控制住了，没有蔓延到其他甲板上。
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

traits.locale_text: 整场旅行期间，我都躲在星语唱诗班中，那里被灵能的冰层覆盖。我看到船医的侍仆们冲向那些发出无声尖啸的灵能者，试图给他们注射镇定剂。那些被注射了烈性镇定剂的人身体瘫痪下来，狂乱的思维也被迫中止，有些人甚至连心脏都停止了跳动。影响那些星语者的癔症被无情地控制住了，没有蔓延到其他甲板上。

languages.text: 感応通信聖歌隊ベイでジャンプを過ごしたのだが、そこはサイキックの氷の固まりで覆われていた。船の医師達のアコライトが、何も言わずに暴れる異能者達に群がって、鎮静剤を投与しようとしているのを眺めていた。強力な薬を投与された者達の体は麻痺して、その暴れ回る心は時折、心臓の鼓動のように穏やかになることを強制された。感応通信官を襲った衝動は容赦なく封じ込められ、他のデッキに広がることはなかった。
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信聖歌隊ベイでジャンプを過ごしたのだが、そこはサイキックの氷の固まりで覆われていた。船の医師達のアコライトが、何も言わずに暴れる異能者達に群がって、鎮静剤を投与しようとしているのを眺めていた。強力な薬を投与された者達の体は麻痺して、その暴れ回る心は時折、心臓の鼓動のように穏やかになることを強制された。感応通信官を襲った衝動は容赦なく封じ込められ、他のデッキに広がることはなかった。

languages.text: Ich habe den gesamten Sprung in der Abteilung des Astropathischen Chors verbracht, die mit einer Kruste aus psychischem Eis bedeckt war. Ich sah, wie die Akolythen des Schiffschirurgen zu den stumm tobenden Psionikern liefen, um sie mit Sedativen ruhigzustellen. Die Körper derjenigen, die diese starken Medikamente erhielten, waren gelähmt, ihr wütender Geist zur Stille gezwungen – und manchmal leider auch ihr Herzschlag. Die Hysterie, die von den Astropathen Besitz ergriff, wurde rücksichtslos eingedämmt und breitete sich nicht auf die anderen Decks aus.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

languages.text: J'ai passé toute la traversée dans le chœur astropathique, qui était recouvert d'une gangue de glace psychique. J'ai vu les acolytes du chirurgien du vaisseau se précipiter sur les psykers qui déliraient en silence pour tenter de leur administrer des sédatifs. Les corps de ceux qui avaient reçu ce traitement se retrouvaient paralysés, et leurs esprits déchaînés étaient contraints à la paralysie, tout comme les battements des cœurs de certains d'entre eux. L'hystérie qui s'était emparée des astropathes a été contenue de manière impitoyable et ne s'est pas propagée aux autres ponts.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.

J'ai vu les acolytes du chirurgien du vaisseau se précipiter sur les psykers qui déliraient en silence pour tenter de leur administrer des sédatifs. Les corps de ceux qui avaient reçu ce traitement se retrouvaient paralysés, et leurs esprits déchaînés étaient contraints à la paralysie, tout comme les battements des cœurs de certains d'entre eux. L'hystérie qui s'était emparée des astropathes a été contenue de manière impitoyable et ne s'est pas propagée aux autres ponts.

languages.text: Bütün sıçrama sürecini, ruhani bir buz tabakasıyla kaplanmış Astropatik Koro bölmesinde geçirdim. Gemi cerrahının havarilerinin, sessizce çıldıran ruhsezerlerin yanına koşup onlara sakinleştirici verişini izledim. O ağır ilaçları alanların bedenleri felç oluyor, deliliğin kıyısındaki zihinleri ise bazen kalp atışlarının da sessizleşmesi riski pahasına durgunlaşmaya zorlanıyordu. Astropatları avucuna alan histeri amansızca bastırılıyor ve diğer güvertelere yayılması engelleniyordu.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the Astropathic Choir bay, which was covered in a crust of psychic ice. I watched as the acolytes of the ship's surgeon rushed the silently raving psykers, attempting to dose them with sedatives. The bodies of those who had been given the harsh medicine were paralysed, and their rampaging minds forced into stillness, as was the beating of their hearts, at times. The hysteria that gripped the Astropaths was ruthlessly contained and did not break through to the other decks.
